response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that I believe holds immense value for you. This product, tailored specifically to meet your needs and aspirations, is priced at $1,100,000. Given its significance and the potential it holds for you, I am confident that this investment would be highly rewarding.

Please consider this offer carefully. If you have any questions or require further information about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. I am here to assist you in any way possible.

Thank you for considering my proposal. I look forward to the possibility of working together to bring this valuable asset into your possession.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1100000}
